text: Sano wawalongolele ni kuwa wandanda (mu Usilamu) mwa Akusama (wawasamile ku Maaka), ni Akukamuchisya (wali alukosyo wa mâ€™Madina), kwisa soni awala wawaakuyiye wanganyao mwa umbone, Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pa malipilo gatachaalipila), soni walinganyichisye wanganyao Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima pasi pakwe sulo. Chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Kwalakweko ni kupunda kwekulungwa nnope
